predicate.note: Frames file for 'redeploy' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry at the moment. Also no entry for 'deploy,' oddly enough.

example.name: the one example
example.text: First, they are designed to eliminate the risk of prepayment -- mortgage-backed securities can be retired early if interest rates decline, and such prepayment forces investors to redeploy their money at lower rates.
